Information about each plant or seed is shown on this page. Plants in the same Genus or Family are also shown below, enabling you to explore similar plants.

The image above is a low resolution and watermarked example. If you would like to receive the high resolution image please note the HPS Number at the top and make a request to the image librarian using the button below.

The metrics for the full resolution image are:

Dimensions: 2,560 pixels wide by 1,920 pixels high

Resolution: 72 dpi horizontally; 72 dpi vertically
